title: Taco Calzones
directions: Brown ground beef and add taco seasoning packet. Add the required amount of water according to the seasoning packet and simmer. Roll out dough, stretching to almost the edges of your pan. Spread cooked ground beef mixture. Top with cheese. Roll up starting from one of the longer ends. Place seam side down. Spray a little cooking spray underneath it by carefully moving it around. Bake at 350 for 15 to 25 minutes or until golden brown. Slice and serve with sour cream,Â guacamole, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes if desired. Enjoy!
ingredients: Optional: sour cream, guacamole, shredded lettuce, diced tomato
